title: Little Alchemy 2: How to Make & Use Beer + Fastest Unlock Paths

steps.title: Beer is made by combining Wheat and Alcohol.
steps.content: Beer is made by combining Wheat and Alcohol. Wheat can be made by combining Grass with Farmer , Domestication , or Field and Alcohol can be made by combining Time and Juice , Wheat and Fruit , Wheat and Juice , or Fruit and Sun . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Using Time.
steps.content: Using Time. Time is an element that is unlocked only after you've unlocked 100 other elements. If you have Time, you can unlock Beer quickly by following this path: [2] X Research source Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Primordial Soup + Time = Life Clay + Life = Human Stone + Fire = Metal Earth + Metal = Plow Human + Plow = Farmer Plow + Earth = Field Farmer + Field = Vegetable Vegetable + Water = Juice Time + Juice = Alcohol Earth + Life = Soil Life + Soil = Plant Plant + Earth = Grass Grass + Field = Wheat Alcohol + Wheat = Beer

steps.title: Without using Time.
steps.content: Without using Time. If you don't have Time, you can follow the following path to quickly unlock Ice (and you might unlock Time along the way!): [3] X Research source Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial Soup + Energy = Life Earth + Life = Soil Life + Soil = Plant Earth + Earth = Land Land + Land = Continent Continent + Continent = Planet Planet + Fire = Sun Water + Sun = Rainbow Plant + Rainbow = Flower Flower + Water = Fruit Fruit + Sun = Alcohol Plant + Earth = Grass Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Stone + Fire = Metal Earth + Metal = Plow Plow + Earth = Field Grass + Field = Wheat Alcohol + Wheat = Beer

steps.title: Beer is used in a few Little Alchemy 2 recipes.
steps.content: Beer is used in a few Little Alchemy 2 recipes. Some of these recipes require DLC. [4] X Research source Bottle = Container + Beer Drunk = Human + Beer Sugar = Beer + Fire or Beer + Energy Dionysus = Deity + Beer (Myths and Monsters DLC required)

steps.title: There are two Fanon recipes using Beer.
steps.content: There are two Fanon recipes using Beer. Fanon elements don't actually exist in the game, but are simply fun recipes and elements created by fans of Little Alchemy 2 and posted on the Little Alchemy wiki. [5] X Research source There are two Fanon elements created with Beer: Czechia and Germany, which are both "created" by combining Beer and Country (another Fanon element).
